title: Notion Dashboard
description: The Notion Dashboard is a comprehensive visual representation of key performance and usage metrics for your Notion workspace. This Datadog dashboard provides real-time insights into the health, activity, and performance of your Notion workspace, enabling you to make data-driven decisions.
